      • supportsASKQueries

        public boolean supportsASKQueries()
        Flag indicating whether ASK queries are supported. Specific TripleSource implementations may use this information to decide whether to use ASK or SELECT for source selection.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether ASK queries are supported
